definition: to sense/to perceive/to come to realize/to be aware
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

sentences.english: This constant choiceless awareness ends all illusions and all hypocrisy.
sentences.chinese: 这种不停的无选择的觉察终结了所有幻觉和所有虚伪。

sentences.english: Knowing that these thoughts are there is an important first stage in overcoming attention-seeking behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 要克服注意力寻求的行为第一步是觉察这类的想法。

sentences.english: A method reducing Cost of Service based on Context-Aware Computing is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出基于觉察上下文计算的降低服务成本的方法。

sentences.english: I passed from her eyes, she has been aware of it, but the eye-blink.
sentences.chinese: 我从她眼前走过，她有所觉察，眼睛却一眨不眨。

sentences.english: The woman became aware of footsteps hurrying after her.
sentences.chinese: 那位妇女觉察到身后有匆忙的脚步声。

sentences.english: Mr. Knightley, in his turn, saw signs of some secret agreement between Jane Fairfax and Frank Churchill.
sentences.chinese: 而奈特利先生则觉察到简和邱吉尔之间已有某种秘约。

sentences.english: 38Father Conmee perceived her perfume in the car.
sentences.chinese: 38康米神父觉察出车厢里散发着她那香水的芬芳。

sentences.english: I was too sleepy to be aware of how cold it was.
sentences.chinese: 我太困了以致无法觉察出有多冷。

sentences.english: So awareness is something that is not cultivable.
sentences.chinese: 因此觉察是某种不可培养的东西。

sentences.english: Such is the state of mind that Natalie discerns in the car.
sentences.chinese: 这就是娜塔丽在车上觉察出的一般人的心理。

sentences.english: No one suspected the anguish he carried on his shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 没人觉察出他所承担的痛苦。

sentences.english: He was little alive to the dangerous situation.
sentences.chinese: 他并没有觉察到自己已面临险境。

sentences.english: The German students also have higher self- perception ability than the Chinese students.
sentences.chinese: 德国学生的自我觉察能力得分也高于中国学生。

sentences.english: It is all related therefore in the perception of the Amethyst Quartz Kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 因此紫水晶国王觉察到，一切都相关。

sentences.english: Grade-two thinking is the detection of contradictions.
sentences.chinese: 第二个等级的思考是对于矛盾的觉察。

sentences.english: AWARE】I was too sleepy to be aware of how cold it was.
sentences.chinese: 我太困以致无法觉察出有多冷。

definition: to sense/to perceive/to become aware of/to detect
to become aware/to detect/to realize/to perceive
to find out/to ascertain/to get an idea of
to pry into or spy on/to snoop/to peep/to poke one's nose into/to peer/to get a glimpse of
